venue.name: University of New Hampshire, Memorial Union Building (MUB)

item.description:
The YAL Campaign Bootcamp is put on by Young Americans for Liberty, Campaign for Liberty and other grassroots organizations.  Both YAL and CFL were created from the Ron Paul 2008 campaign so I can assure you that they are fantastic organizations.  Ron Paul is informally involved with both organizations.

This is an all ages, full day political training event starting at 10:00 AM and ending at 7:00 PM.  All materials, lunch and even dinner are included for the nominal fee of $20.

If you have ever thought about running for office or even helping someone else run for office (including Ron Paul), this is your lucky day.  This Bootcamp will be the best political training event put on by pro-liberty organizations in New England all year.  Feel free to invite your friends from all over the area as they will not find anything this good anywhere else in NE.

Early registration is encouraged and you do not have to attend the entire event if you want to leave early.

For additional information and to register for the event, please check out this link, http://www.yaliberty.org/campaignbootcamps

If you are driving yourself, I was told to pass this info along, "Parking at the MUB at the University of New Hampshire in Durham on Saturday, October 1st is free, as long as you're in C lot on Mill Rd. across from the Rite Aid plaza"

If you live in the Keene, Concord or Manchester areas and would like a free ride to the event, email me at keithcarlsen@gmail.com
item.name: YAL Campaign Bootcamp
